title: No Reason to Vote Republican
author: VD
content_html:
But nothing for the American community. Or other communities of European descent. There is no reason for the Republican Party to exist anymore, as postponing the now-inevitable collapse serves no positive purpose. It’s counterintuitive, but the sooner the USA collapses, the better it will be for Americans.

DISCUSS ON SG
